column1: Table 31. Percent of victimizations involving strangers, by gender and marital status of victims and type of crime
data source: National Criminal Victimization Survey, 2005  NCJ 215244
authors:  Patsy Klaus and Cathy Maston
Table 31. Personal crimes of violence, 2005:  Percent of victimizations involving strangers, by gender and marital status of victims and type of crime
Note: Excludes data on persons whose marital status was not ascertained.
*Estimate is based on about 10 or fewer sample cases.
a/Includes verbal threats of rape and threats of sexual assault.
